languages.text: "Под контролем, лейтенант?! Я прибыла сюда, чтобы возглавить спецотряд, и что я увидела?! Это практически мятеж! Здесь уже не в чем разбираться, здесь необходима немедленная зачистка и дисциплинарные расстрелы! А ты, Вент, в шаге от трибунала!"

"Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"
languages.original_text: "Под контролем, лейтенант?! Я прибыла сюда, чтобы возглавить спецотряд, и что я увидела?! Это практически мятеж! Здесь уже не в чем разбираться, здесь необходима немедленная зачистка и дисциплинарные расстрелы! А ты, Вент, в шаге от трибунала!"

traits.locale_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I've come here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate, this calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

"Under control, Lieutenant? I've come here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate, this calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

"Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

"Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

"Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

"Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

languages.text: "Unter Kontrolle, Lieutenant? Ich bin hier, um eine Untersuchung zu leiten, und was sehe ich? Wir stehen kurz vor einer Meuterei! Es gibt hier nichts zu untersuchen ... was wir brauchen, sind sofortige Repressalien und Erschießungskommandos! Und Ihr, Vent, werdet Euch ebenfalls verantworten müssen."
languages.original_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

traits.locale_text: "Unter Kontrolle, Lieutenant? Ich bin hier, um eine Untersuchung zu leiten, und was sehe ich? Wir stehen kurz vor einer Meuterei! Es gibt hier nichts zu untersuchen ... was wir brauchen, sind sofortige Repressalien und Erschießungskommandos! Und Ihr, Vent, werdet Euch ebenfalls verantworten müssen."

languages.text: « Vous en êtes bien sûre, lieutenante ? Je suis venue jusqu'ici pour superviser une enquête, et qu'est-ce que je vois ? La populace est au bord de la mutinerie ! Inutile d'enquêter, la seule solution, c'est la répression immédiate et le déploiement de pelotons d'exécution ! Quant à vous, Vent, vous êtes à deux doigts de faire vous aussi l'objet de représailles ! »
languages.original_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous en êtes bien sûre, lieutenante ? Je suis venue jusqu'ici pour superviser une enquête, et qu'est-ce que je vois ? La populace est au bord de la mutinerie ! Inutile d'enquêter, la seule solution, c'est la répression immédiate et le déploiement de pelotons d'exécution ! Quant à vous, Vent, vous êtes à deux doigts de faire vous aussi l'objet de représailles ! »

languages.text: «¿Bajo control, teniente? He venido aquí a dirigir una unidad de investigación y ¿qué me encuentro? ¡A esta chusma al borde del motín! No hace falta una investigación, ¡hacen falta represalias inmediatas y un pelotón de fusilamiento! Vent, ¡está a un paso de tener que afrontar cargos usted!».
languages.original_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Bajo control, teniente? He venido aquí a dirigir una unidad de investigación y ¿qué me encuentro? ¡A esta chusma al borde del motín! No hace falta una investigación, ¡hacen falta represalias inmediatas y un pelotón de fusilamiento! Vent, ¡está a un paso de tener que afrontar cargos usted!».

languages.text: 「統制は取れていますか、副官？私は調査隊を率いるべくここに来たのですが、これは何です？暴徒は今にも暴動を起こしそうではありませんか！調査することなど何もない。これは単純に、即座の弾圧及び銃殺を求めているだけです！そしてヴェント、あなた自身も告発される一歩手前なのです！」
languages.original_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

traits.locale_text: 「統制は取れていますか、副官？私は調査隊を率いるべくここに来たのですが、これは何です？暴徒は今にも暴動を起こしそうではありませんか！調査することなど何もない。これは単純に、即座の弾圧及び銃殺を求めているだけです！そしてヴェント、あなた自身も告発される一歩手前なのです！」

languages.text: “你说你控制住了局面，中尉？我是来指导调查小组工作的，可我看到了什么？这群乌合之众已经在哗变的边缘了！已经没什么好调查的了，我要求立刻镇压叛乱，枪毙那些叛乱分子！至于你，温特，你离面临指控只有一步之遥了！”
languages.original_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"

traits.locale_text: “你说你控制住了局面，中尉？我是来指导调查小组工作的，可我看到了什么？这群乌合之众已经在哗变的边缘了！已经没什么好调查的了，我要求立刻镇压叛乱，枪毙那些叛乱分子！至于你，温特，你离面临指控只有一步之遥了！”

languages.text: "Kontrol altında mı Teğmen? Buraya inceleme birimini yönetmeye geldim, peki ne gördüm? Ayaktakımı isyanın eşiğine gelmiş! Burada incelenecek bir şey kalmamış. Buraya derhâl baskı uygulayıp idam mangası getirmek gerek! Sana gelince Vent, yargılanmana ramak kaldı!"
languages.original_text: "Under control, Lieutenant? I came here to lead an investigative unit, and what do I see? The rabble is on the verge of mutiny! There is nothing to investigate — this simply calls for immediate repressions and firing squads! And you, Vent, are a step away from facing charges yourself!"
